name: caw
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the loud, rough cry of a bird such as a crow

(of a bird such as a crow) to cry with a loud, rough sound: I had woken up to the sound of a crow cawing at my window. She could hear the rooks cawing.
More examplesFewer examplesAbove the trees, crows circled and cawed relentlessly. The ravens clucked and cawed at each other in some sort of weird language.Exotic birds caw and hoot in the trees.
